A clear and concise description of the bug.

Which example file has the issue? (e.g., `examples/02_chat_completions/01_basic_chat.py`)

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Run `uv run python examples/...`
2. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened. Include the full error message if applicable.

- OS: [e.g., macOS 14.0, Ubuntu 22.04, Windows 11]
- Python version: [e.g., 3.11.5]
- xAI model used: [e.g., grok-4-1-fast-reasoning]
